description: Tender slow-cooked beef korma will become a fast family favourite. Set and forget in your slow cooker, then serve with a spinach and coconut dal.
keywords: Dinner,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Egg free,Sesame free,Beef,Peanut free,Slow cooked
name: Slow-Cooker Beef & Onion Korma With Dal Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 kg beef chuck steak, cut into 3cm pieces
500g Passage To India Slow Cook Korma
280g Passage To India Split Pea, Spinach & Coconut Dal

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large frying pan over high heat. Cook beef, in batches, for 5 minutes or until browned. Place beef in a 4.5-litre slow cooker*.
Add korma sauce, stock and onion to beef and stir to combine. Cook, covered, on high for 4 hours (or on low for 8 hours) or until beef is very tender.
Meanwhile, heat dal according to packet instructions. Divide beef korma and dal among serving bowls. Drizzle with coconut cream and top with coriander. Serve.
